content:
My kerb is brianle@mit.edu.

For question 1 on microquiz 2, when I copied my code from my IDE to the answer box, I forgot to copy the “def combo(n):” line, resulting in a 0 for that question. With that line, the rest of my code should pass the test cases. 

Is it possible to get partial credit for that question? If not, that is okay as well.

Thank you very much.
subject: Microquiz 2

content: We will take a look and manually grade.
